data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.
data.user_prompt: Write a creative short story using a maximum of five sentences. The story must include the following three words: petrol, diesel, pump. However, the story should not be about going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle.

The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.

data.output: In ancient times when magic was real but messy affairs often involved humans getting hurt by recklessly wielded wands - Alfa used his artistry abilities channeling symbolic gestures along dark walls while accompanying Mystra who liked taunting captives asking them specifics before deciding which torture device would make their charges simply confess loudly what had been originally hidden silently among cryptic shadows they'd leave everywhere around town at all hours since her imagination knew no bounds.

data.output: In ancient times when gods were believed mortal men could converse freely among them it was said Apollo's prized possession wasn't his enchanted lyre but rather 'Elysium' -a mystical pipe-organ grown from vines within Zeus Olympus gardens transporting those who listened into euphoric realms unknown while all surrounding stars came together at night readying silent vigilance ensuring no unworthy soul dared fail refusing silence witness its holy celestial concerts after which if man still failed would never again possess sight understanding true blind nature over praying without answering resulting being spoken forced compliance bring alive live this most beautiful impossible refrains influencing thus natural design telling seeds how sprawling divine comedy brew may tick their deserving heart intertwined sway under disciplined duties long creating purpose relying ultimately differing looking weakened aided divined ascending thereon informed human spirituality who feeds reciprocate accordance losing smell greatness control forever normally concern remarkably oddly burrow but safeguard reactions witness grand symphony their apparent pleasant friendly inducing phenomena they know exist staging beautifully multiplying days moving breath form ring consciously entrenched echoes spiritual tear corners mirror irresistible melody yet return removed harmony chose disrupt casual growing decided oblivious cope purification departed residing discourse learned surviving signify celebrating pattern famously own shared stimulate take much identity defining pulled starving giving straight sure understand rising burdens language thus madness many telling fog inactive running look away definition vicious questioned system violating

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.

data.output: In twilight's hush where shadows danced beneath ancient trees' sprawling limbs was found forgotten 'Gloomhaven', its entrance hidden behind ivy curtains slowly crawling upon rusted iron gates marked by interlocking initials forming faintly legible warnings against those daring trespass - though many claimed village spirits lured passersby seeking revenge from untold betrayals still bitter enough they spawned legend among gossiping townsfolk regarding spectral imps once beating mythical drums drawing succulent melodies leech lifeblood unwary stragglere eventually selecting serfs sacrificing what little sustenance consumed justifying only stark prophecy mumbled interpreted seer wise blaming disappearances due severe famine conjuring outside aid stating wars distant getting occur unwilling viewed settlers substituting disguised attackers ordering cheaper clean animals stock vast unseen readiness selecting serf rest quickly hooked having reasons leashed runaway predicting captivity nor spell invisible vast wind blow reasons leashing hook predicting captivity nor spell invisible vast wind blow selecting serfed rest
